abstract: Bank of America has been paying millions in bonuses to lure talent and retain investment bankers whom the company views as vital, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Bank of America has been paying millions in bonuses to lure talent and retain investment bankers whom the company views as vital, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has been paying millions in bonuses in order to lure talent and retain investment bankers the company views as vital, The New York Post reported, citing sources.

headline.main: BofA Reported to Pay Big Bonuses to Retain Bankers
